content: 2-3 stitches when you insert hook through top of the round 19 stitches pick up one loop from the back of the slip stitches this will secure the rim in place as shown in fig 2 right 20 3 single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet over next 2 st 6 times 24 stitches 21 24 single_crochet all round 22 10 single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet over next 2 stitches twice 22 stitches 23 22 single_crochet all round 24 1 decrease single_crochet over next 2 st 9 single_crochet twice 20 stitches 25 20 single_crochet all round 26 1 decrease single_crochet over next 2 st 8 single_crochet twice 18 stitches 27 18 single_crochet all round from about this point i reached the red yarn and began to crochet over the tail of the red yarn this helps to secure the tail and allows a little red to show through on the outside 28 4 single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet over next 2 st 3 times 15 stitches 29 3 single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet over next 2 st 3 times 12 stitches 30 1 single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet over next 2 st 4 times 8 stitches 31 8 single_crochet all round 32 2 single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet over next 2 st twice 6 stitches continue rounds of 6 single_crochet until stem is desired length when purchased the stem will be 21 mm but many women find their mooncup more comfortable if they trim off some or even all of the stem finish with a slip_stitch then fasten_off and weave in the end
